about.heroSubtitle: More than a platform – The secure foundation for international life dreams.
about.missionText: Buying an international property should be a journey of trust. At TerraCasa, we understand that you're not just buying a house, but realizing a dream. That's why we offer you not just a platform, but a comprehensive knowledge base that helps you learn about countries and cultures – with knowledge and maximum security.
about.visionIntro: We are revolutionizing international real estate purchases by removing the biggest hurdles:
about.securityText: We verify proof of ownership and the identity of every seller, so you have transparency and security. This way, you can invest with confidence.
about.fullSupportText: We ensure that you are not alone. We connect you with a vetted network of local lawyers, notaries, and experts who guide you through every step in your language and according to local law.
about.knowledgeText: We provide you with the best and most intelligent search criteria to precisely find what you are looking for, and we deliver all relevant market and lifestyle information.
about.visionConclusion: TerraCasa is the secure bridge between your dream and your international home.

about.withPassionText: Real estate is more than just objects - they are life dreams that we take seriously.

about.strongTogetherText: Our network grows with everyone who participates - buyers, sellers, partners.
